messages.message: On this page you can see the sms user guide

message.dd:
The received SMS is made up of two things :
- a code, used to answer
- the message

The SMS answer have to be phrased up as the following shema :
<received code> <answer>
Answer can be
- 1 to self assign the alert
- 2 to set as resolved the alert (you have to be the supporter of the alert)
